name: Alolan Dugtrio
flavorText: Its shining gold hair provides it with protection. It's reputed that keeping any of its fallen hairs will bring bad luck.

abilities.name: Tangling Hair
abilities.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Dig Under
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
